iati-activity.reporting-org: Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC)
iati-activity.title: Guinée, crise Ebola : achat de matériel de protection pour opération conjointe
iati-activity.description: The current Ebola outbreak across Guinea, Liberia and Sierra Leone has surpassed all other outbreaks in terms of cases, deaths and geographic spread. The Guinean Ministry of Health (MoH) requested partners to urgently provide protection equipment to its medical staff. The current Ebola outbreak has the potential to spread outside the affected countries and beyond the region if urgent and relevant containing measures are not put in place.
iati-activity.participating-org: Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC)
